name: Northland Dirt Works & Land Clearing

name: Soap Miner
description:
This is the soap your great grandma used to make. Gentle, natural, and moisturizing , and free from anything toxic. These are humble soaps. Once you try our soaps, you will love our soaps.

Our natural soaps are the heart and soul of our brand. Each bar is meticulously crafted using only the finest ingredients, sourced sustainably to ensure that weâ€™re kind to both your skin and the environment. Weâ€™re committed to transparency and quality, so you can trust that each product is free from harmful chemicals and artificial additives.

We view soap making as an art, a harmonious blend of natureâ€™s bounties that speaks to our commitment to sustainability and wellness. Our products are not just soaps; they are a reflection of our passion for purity and self-care.

name: Tallowz
description: Tallowz was founded in 2023 with a simple mission: Create the perfect natural lotion you would use everyday, while supporting the rebuilding of our food system by funding local ranchers and farmers. It's simple, use what has worked for thousands of years before "Big Lotion" showed up. Ditch the man-made bullsh*t by using a better product, all while supporting local ranchers in the process.

name: Heart & Soil
description: Heart & Soil was founded in 2020 by Paul Saladino, MD so more people could enjoy the nourishment of organs in a clean, convenient and taste-free capsule.  Organs are the most nutrient-rich foods on the planet. You can get 100 times more nutrients from organs compared to muscle meats! They include everything your body needs to thrive: vitamins, minerals, peptides, proteins, and growth factors. Thatâ€™s why our ancestors were strong, virile, and vital! Thatâ€™s how they thrived generation after generation in the worldâ€™s harshest environments. And thatâ€™s why weâ€™re making treasured organs easily accessible.

name: Clara & Fritz
description:
CLARA & FRITZ IS A FAMILY-OWNED SHOP SPECIALIZING IN PROVIDING CLEAN, SIMPLE SKIN CARE. 

We strive to make everything with clean, natural ingredients.
We value the good, the true, and the beautiful.
We treat others the way we want to be treated.
We are committed to doing everything with excellence.

name: Salt of the Earth
description:
Welcome to Salt of the Earth, your trusted source of premium electrolyte products. Founded in 2023 by a group of friends in Bali who share a deep passion for surfing and fitness, our company emerged from the common desire to maintain peak performance and optimal hydration amidst the breathtaking waves of Bali. We've used the highest levels of sports nutrition testing and have worked with former Gatorade Sports Science Institute athletes to develop our formula.
At Salt of the Earth, we are dedicated to upholding excellence in quality, taste, and performance. Recognizing the vital role of electrolytes in sustaining optimal hydration levels, particularly during strenuous physical endeavors, we have meticulously designed our electrolyte products to deliver unrivaled hydration and maintain an ideal electrolyte equilibrium.

name: The LeatherMint
description:
Located in the historic neighborhood of Quartier Saint-Henri in MontrÃ©al, where leathercraft was born during the foundation of Nouvelle-France, The LeatherMint is rebuilding from the ground upâ€”this time, on the Bitcoin standard. We are a sovereign and hyperbitcoinized business dedicated to financial independence and craftsmanship. Our operation is unregistered by design, as we believe in commerce without permission, upholding the values of freedom and autonomy that Bitcoin represents.

Full grain leather and solid brass hardware. Belts, Wallets, Sleeves for Hardware Signing Devices, Passport Holders.

name: Ketolish
description:
Low sugar beef jerky thatâ€™s deliciously made in Minnesota using locally-sourced lean ground meats and quality ingredients. Payment only in sats. DM or email to receive the payment invoice.
My low-sugar jerky is made per your order, from fresh (never frozen) beef thatâ€™s sourced from St. Michael, MN and freshly ground the day we get it from our processor (never pink slime in a tube from a grocery chain!). We strive to make each batch within 1-2 days and ship no later than 2 business days after itâ€™s made, to provide you the freshest low sugar jerky. Ground meat jerky is easier to chew than jerky made from strips of muscle meat, because itâ€™s got a more tender texture. We also occasionally make ground bison, ground elk, and ground chicken jerky (limited to supply availability).

name: Start9
description:
Take back control
Everything you do online is intermediated - your actions permissioned, your data custodied.

Opt out by running a private server.

Previously, this was only available to the tech savvy and the wealthy. Start9 levels the playing field by making it possible for everyone else.

name: Bitcoin Magazine Store
description:
The Bitcoin Magazine Store is an online retail platform offering a diverse range of Bitcoin-themed products. The store features print magazines including their latest "The Mining Issue," alongside books like "The Satoshi Papers" and "Fiat Ruins Everything." 

Their merchandise collection includes clothing (t-shirts, sweaters), accessories (hats, mugs), and even Bitcoin-themed Crocs. The store also sells hardware for Bitcoin storage and limited-edition art pieces including the "Fiat House of Cards," "Bitcoin War Bonds," and "Bukele Bucks" collections. 

For Bitcoin enthusiasts seeking collectibles, the store offers exclusive items through their "Bitcoin Originals" and "Pepenardo Collection." They accept Bitcoin payments via IBEX, ship from the US, and provide interest-free payment options for customers.

name: BTC Financial Advisors Network
description:
The Bitcoin Financial Advisors Network is a group of independent financial planning experts who meet qualifications and standards that exceed those of most financial planners.

We each operate our own separate businesses, but are united by our commitment to provide clients with the highest quality of advice. All of our members believe that bitcoin is money, adopt it personally, and recommend to clients.

name: BTC Aloha
description:
Aloha! I'm the Bitcoin artist "Sea is Medicine" otherwise known as Naomi Olson

BTC Aloha combines my collage art, my love of the surf + sea, with my passion for Bitcoin. I create sustainable, high quality wearable art, aloha shirts & beach accessories that make you feel like one in 21 Million. Peace & prosperity is the foundation of the Bitcoin economy. I want you to feel that simplicity, value, elegance and heart in every BTC Aloha product.

The Bitcoin Beachwear Brand
Handmade to Order in England or Limited Editions Handmade in Mexico
Bitcoiner Owned Business. Bitcoin Artist Designs
Luxury Natural Fabrics 100% Cotton, Silk, Linen
Sustainable Slow Fashion
Full of Seaspiration

name: FOMO21
description: At FOMO21, we believe Bitcoin is more than just a technologyâ€”itâ€™s a movement reshaping the way we think about freedom, innovation, and the future. Its revolutionary, non-violent principles inspire hope for a better world. Our mission is to create fun, high-quality merchandise that not only promotes Bitcoin adoption but also celebrates the values of decentralization, independence, and financial empowerment. Whether you're a die-hard Bitcoiner or exploring the ethos of this transformative lifestyle, FOMO21 is here to help you wear your passion and spark conversations about a brighter, freer future.

name: Highland Wealth Management
description: Fee only financial advising

name: The Saif House
description:
THE BITCOINERS' BOOKSHOP
The best bitcoin books delivered worldwide in all formats, at the best prices, with the best bitcoin & fiat checkout experience.

Founded by best-selling author Saifedean Ammous, The Saif House makes the best Bitcoin books available worldwide, in physical, digital, and audio formats, while allowing you to pay in bitcoin (lightning or on-chain), or with fiat.

name: Sweet Sats
description: SweetSats is itcoin only. Prices are listed in Sats, and payment is accepted only in Bitcoin. This site is self-hosted and payments are processed via BTCPay server direct to our node or Zaps sent to our self-custodial Lightning address. Meaning: there are no third parties involved. No tracking, no credit card processors, no sales tax, no bullshit. Simply trading pure honey, maple syrup and other homemade & homegrown products for Bitcoin!

name: Kagi Search
description:
Kagi Search is a highly accurate, lightning-fast, user-centric, 100% privacy-respecting search engine with results augmented by non-commercial indexes and personalized searches. Kagi features a clean, high-performance user interface with only the most relevant results and no telemetry, ads, or collection of private information. You can learn more about its unique features, including the use of Lenses and Personalized Results.

We are confident that Kagi will help you amplify your search abilities, become more creative in finding information, and accelerate your productivity.

name: Satoshi Coffee Co.
description:
Our Roast is the Proof of Work
Now you can taste freedom first thing in the morning and also participate in the circular bitcoin economy. Satoshi Coffee Co. offers fresh-roasted coffee that you can purchase using the Lightning Network or on-chain BTC. We try to ship the same day as your order, so you can ensure you receive the freshest, highest quality coffee from us.

name: Proof of Ink
description: At Proof of Ink, weâ€™re driven by a love for Bitcoin and exceptional T-shirt art. Our mission is to partner with talented Bitcoin artists, turning their bold designs into high-quality, hand-crafted screen-printed T-shirts that are as unique as the blockchain itself. Each shirt is more than just clothingâ€”itâ€™s a wearable piece of art, a collectible, and a nod to the Bitcoin movement.

name: Sovran Systems
description:
Sovran Systems was created out of necessity from the ever growing reach of big tech and governments into our digital lives. Their systems promote greater surveillance and the closing of our privacy and digital freedom. Sovran Systems mission is to give us more choices outside of these monopolistic enterprises, which only seek to gain more control. We need practical hope from this dystopic technocratic nightmare.

Sovran Systems curates all the best privacy software into one system that is easy to use. We are grounded in Natural Law and are on the front lines of this battle to get all people to digital Freedom and digital Sovereignty.

Come join this computer movement to become the ultimate digital Freedom Warrior you were born to be!

name: CryptoCloaks
description:
CryptoCloaks LLC was born from the love of 3D printing and the idea of Bitcoin. Our passion for 3D design sparked in December of 2017 with our first product, a Ledger Nano S mount. This product allowed us to safely and securely keep the Ledger hidden. After the success from this mount we quickly grew and have been designing and manufacturing ever since, thanks to our customers who believe in our products!

We strive for quality products and innovative solutions for keeping your Bitcoin safe and looking great.

name: Solo Satoshi
description:
Solo Satoshi is dedicated to the advancement of open-sourced Bitcoin mining, with a steadfast commitment to the security and decentralization of the Bitcoin network. As a pioneering force in the Bitcoin space, our mission is to empower individuals and businesses worldwide with innovative, secure, and decentralized mining solutions.

At Solo Satoshi, we believe in the transformative power of open-source software and the potential it holds for the future of Bitcoin mining. We strive to foster a community of developers and enthusiasts who share our vision of a more secure and decentralized Bitcoin landscape. Our dedication to open-source principles is at the heart of our mission, driving our commitment to transparency, collaboration, and innovation.

We are passionate about supporting the growth and development of the Bitcoin network, and we recognize the critical role that open-source software and developers play in achieving this goal. By promoting and contributing to the open-source ecosystem, we aim to facilitate a more robust and resilient Bitcoin network, ensuring its longevity and success for years to come.

At Solo Satoshi, our mission is not only to provide cutting-edge mining solutions but also to educate and inspire others about the importance of decentralization and open-source principles in the Bitcoin space. We believe that by working together, we can create a future where Bitcoin mining is more accessible, efficient, and aligned with the core values of decentralization and open collaboration.
